author: John Kilraine
title: Dublin road space being used for pedestrians over virus
description: Parking spaces around Dublin city will have to be taken over for pedestrian use to allow social distancing, according to the city council.
content:
Parking spaces around Dublin city will have to be taken over for pedestrian use to allow social distancing, according to the city council.
The council is going to use the road space to cater for overspills of pedestrians trying to avoid queues for shops.
